Crimes.Legal_Issue: Jurisdiction of the Federal Court to review refusal to amend name on immigration documents
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Refugee claimant seeking correction of name on official documents
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Initial provision of false name affects credibility
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Request to correct name on official documents
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Finality and legal consequences of administrative decision
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Decision not final; lacks legal consequences
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Whether decision is final under s. 18.1
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Final decision with legal consequences required for judicial review
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Refusal to amend name upheld due to lack of jurisdiction
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether refusal constitutes a 'decision' under s. 18.1
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Name change request denied as non-final administrative act
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Use of false name at entry
